title: Philip Hammond – 2018 Speech at Commonwealth Heads of Government Meeting
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Philip Hammond, the Chancellor of the Exchequer, at the Heads of Government Meeting in London on 17 April 2018.
content:
[![](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/philiphammond-1.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/philiphammond-1.jpg)
